html:
cruel gloom upon us
severe winter reigns
hoofbeats pierce the air
a bang suddenly blasts
star explosion sows the dust
shatters everything around
radioactive diamond, beautiful
fills a large space
where's my asylum, where am i safe
is this my last moment already
it's about life, freedom and life
i need to win this uneven fight
where is that land of clear brooks
forests, animals of all kinds
where is a comfy house
where is food and a hot bath
title: Chase
